info.name: Whisper Speech-To-Text
info.summary: Speech-To-Text provider running OpenAI Whisper locally
info.description:
Speech-To-Text provider running OpenAI Whisper locally
The models run completely on your machine. No private data leaves your servers.
Requirements: * Architecture: x86-64 with AVX support * OS: Linux
Model sizes:
* Small: 500MB * Medium: 1.5Gb * Large: 3.1GB
After installing this app you will need to run
occ stt_whisper:download-models [model-name]
where [model-name] is one of
* small * medium (default) * large

NOTE:
A few things to keep in mind.
* Transcriptions need to be enabled in the Talk app if you need the calls to be transcribed with any Speech to Text provider (including this app). It can be set using this `occ` command:
``` occ config:app:set spreed call_recording_transcription --value yes ```
* This app tends to be heavy on CPU. If it starts to be an issue in your normal workflow, you can limit the number of threads used by Whisper in the "Whisper Speech-To-Text" section in the admin settings * The generated transcriptions may vary in accuracy based on the spoken language. * Per participant transcription in calls is currently not available but PRs are welcome!
